Package lib.homies.framework.minigame

Interface MiniGameManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMiniGameManager
public interface MiniGameManager
A platform-agnostic interface for managing minigames within the framework. This service allows for registering, unregistering, and retrieving MiniGame instances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Set<MiniGame>
    getAllGames()
    Retrieves a set of all currently registered minigames.
    Optional<MiniGame>
    getGame(String name)
    Retrieves a registered minigame by its name.
    void
    registerGame(MiniGame game)
    Registers a new minigame with the manager.
    void
    unregisterGame(String name)
    Unregisters a minigame from the manager.

  • Method Details

    • registerGame

      void registerGame(MiniGame game)
      Registers a new minigame with the manager. The minigame will be accessible by its name.
      Parameters:
      game - The MiniGame instance to register.

    • unregisterGame

      void unregisterGame(String name)
      Unregisters a minigame from the manager.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the minigame to unregister.

    • getGame

      Optional<MiniGame> getGame(String name)
      Retrieves a registered minigame by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the minigame.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the MiniGame if found, otherwise Optional.empty().

    • getAllGames

      Set<MiniGame> getAllGames()
      Retrieves a set of all currently registered minigames.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable Set of all active MiniGame instances.
